title: SONG: Tusse - 'Innan Du Går'
text:
SONG: Tusse - 'Innan Du Går'
What’s this? The reigning champ of Swedish Idol, Tusse, releases his first music since releasing the winner’s single at the end of last year. This is ‘Innan Du Går’.
What’s it like? Raising the tempo from its predecessor, it’s an upbeat and bouncy number that tunes right into what’s arguably the most popular style of pop right now in Sweden.
Written by? Daniella Binyamin, Oskar Nyman and Eric Saade, no less!
More from Tusse? If you’ve yet to check out one of the best songs of 2019 – here’s is previous single ‘Rain‘.
You can find ‘Innan Du Går’ on our Best New Pop playlist.
